content.original: A Hand Actuator specifically designed for the OmniPods of a OmniMech. Allows to add a Hand Actuator even on OmniChassis normally not fitting these. Requires a Lower Arm or OmniPod Lower Arm Actuator. CANNOT BE USED WITH ARM MOUNTED BALLISTICS OR PPC'S.

content.original: An OmniMech is a highly configurable type of BattleMech. OmniMechs mount some of their loadout in modular OmniPods. This gives Omnis the ability to replace damaged components and change battlefield role to fulfill mission requirements. Though not solely created for modular weapon loadouts, the OmniMech design greatly aids repair and construction. Once their modular weaponry and equipment is removed, the empty bays provide better access to repair the chassis. Damaged components such as arms and legs can be easily repaired in half the time it takes for common BattleMechs.

content.original: Based upon Comstar's groundbreaking XL gyro has Vining Engineering and Salvage Team managed to push the technology even further, further reducing the weight of the mechs gyro, but doubling its size going even into the side Torsos.
